extensionDescription.message: ICAL's todo have status that are just perfect for a basic Kanban board. This extension provides it so that you can manage your tasks visually. There are two ways to display the Kanban board once the extension has been installed. The first one is through the 'Kanban' button displayed in the top window bar when consulting emails. The second one is through the 'Tools' menu in which you can find an item named 'Display Kanban board'.

menuItem.description: Menu item to start the kanban board

helpHeader.message: How to use the Kanban board
helpHeader.description: Header of the help modal dialog

help1.message: The Kanban board is a tool for visualizing work, which helps you to manage tasks and projects. The board is divided into three columns: "Needs action", "In process", and "Completed". Each column represents a stage of the work process. You can move tasks between columns by dragging and dropping them.
help1.description: First paragraph of help modal dialog

help2.message: To create a new task, click on the "New task..." button. Fill in the form and click on the "Save " button. To edit a task, click on the pen icon in the task card.
help2.description: Second paragraph of help modal dialog

help3.message: You can filter tasks by calendar and priority. You can sort tasks by due date, priority, and percent complete.
help3.description: Third paragraph of help modal dialog
